strengths: Early exploration advantage — Dark Energy Tap lets you explore frontier tokens immediately
Aetherstream tech gives cruisers exceptional speed (7+ with other movement tech)
Two faction promissory notes instead of one — superior negotiating power
Commander enables retaliation/rebuild after an attack
weaknesses: Commander unlock is difficult (must be neighbors with all other players)
Middling home system production — great influence but limited resources
Relies on diplomatic positioning more than raw power
tips: Exploit frontier exploration early — you have a 1-2 round head start on frontier relics
Your promissory notes are mutually beneficial — use them as diplomatic currency
Pivot toward anomaly-heavy movement optimization mid-game
Aetherstream + mobility upgrades creates unmatched cruiser speed
Work toward Commander unlock by expanding influence across the map
